content.text: I am doing good, thanks! I am actually looking into ways to cope with my wife's terminal cancer. Do you have any resources that you would recommend?

I am so sorry to hear about your wife. I cannot imagine what you are going through. I have heard that the book "When Bad Things Happen to Good People" is very helpful. It has a lot of practical advice for how to cope with grief and loss.
Thank you so much for the recommendation. I will definitely check it out.
You're welcome. I hope it helps.
Thank you. I am going to spend some time with my dog on Christmas. I think that will help me to relax.
That sounds like a great idea. I love spending time with my dog. They are such great companions.
Me too. My dog is always there for me.
I am glad to hear that. I hope you have a wonderful Christmas.
Thank you. I hope you have a wonderful Christmas too.
